short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get helpful FHIR links and tools across the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ”¥ The Firely browser extension provides helpful tools for working with FHIR across the web:
